channel.title: [PI] Need level to use item? [HOW] [PI] Hybrid Pvp....:(
channel.description:
Hi :> i've been trying to get all the skillcapes to require level 99 for each skill to wear. so i went to itemAssistant.java and then i entered: [code]case 9756: case 9757: case 9758: c.rangeLevelReq = 99; break; case 9747: case 9748: case 9749: c.attackLevelReq = 99; break; case 9750: case 9751: case 9752: c.strengthLevelReq = 99; break; case 9753: case 9754: case 9755: c.defenceLevelReq = 99; break; case 9759: case 9760: case 9761: c.prayerLevelReq = 99; break; case 9762: case 9763: case 9764: c.magicLevelReq = 99; break; case 9765: case 9766: case 9767: c.runecraftingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9768: case 9769: case 9770: c.constitutionLevelReq = 99; break; case 9771: case 9772: case 9773: c.agilityLevelReq = 99; break; case 9774: case 9775: case 9776: c.herbloreLevelReq = 99; break; case 9777: case 9778: case 9779: c.thievingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9780: case 9781: case 9782: c.craftingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9783: case 9784: case 9785: c.fletchingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9786: case 9787: case 9788: c.slayerLevelreq = 99; break; case 9792: case 9793: case 9794: c.miningLevelReq = 99; break; case 9795: case 9796: case 9797: c.smithingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9798: case 9799: case 9800: c.fishingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9801: case 9802: case 9803: c.cookingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9804: case 9805: case 9806: c.firemakingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9807: case 9808: case 9809: c.woodcuttingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9810: case 9811: case 9812: c.farmingLevelReq = 99; break; case 12169: case 12170: case 12171: c.summonLevelReq = 99; break; case 9948: case 9949: case 9950: c.hunterLevelReq = 99; break;[/code] then i got this 14 errors saying that i didnt have that skill that skill etc. so i added [code] prayerLevelReq, runecraftingLevelReq, constitutionLevelReq, agilityLevelReq, herbloreLevelReq, thievingLevelReq, craftingLevelReq, slayerLevelreq, miningLevelReq, smithingLevelReq, cookingLevelReq, firemakingLevelReq, woodcuttingLevelReq, farmingLevelReq,[/code] into player.java after the hunterLevelReq, Then i had no errors.. but i could still use the items when i was level 1 atk str etc... (Skills)
Help me. :<
Error i had were like this [code]src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:884: cannot find symbol symbol : variable prayerLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.prayerLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:894: cannot find symbol symbol : variable runecraftingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.runecraftingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:899: cannot find symbol symbol : variable constitutionLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.constitutionLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:904: cannot find symbol symbol : variable agilityLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.agilityLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:909: cannot find symbol symbol : variable herbloreLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.herbloreLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:914: cannot find symbol symbol : variable thievingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.thievingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:919: cannot find symbol symbol : variable craftingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.craftingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:929: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slayerLevelreq location: class server.model.players.Client c.slayerLevelreq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:934: cannot find symbol symbol : variable miningLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.miningLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:939: cannot find symbol symbol : variable smithingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.smithingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:949: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cookingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.cookingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:954: cannot find symbol symbol : variable firemakingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.firemakingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:959: cannot find symbol symbol : variable woodcuttingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.woodcuttingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable farmingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.farmingLevelReq = 99; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 14 errors [/code]

item.title: [PI] Need level to use item? [HOW] [PI] Hybrid Pvp....:(
item.dc:creator: @buzzern buzzern
item.description:
@buzzern wrote:

Hi :> i’ve been trying to get all the skillcapes to require level 99 for each skill to wear.
so i went to itemAssistant.java and then i entered:

case 9756: case 9757: case 9758: c.rangeLevelReq = 99; break; case 9747: case 9748: case 9749: c.attackLevelReq = 99; break; case 9750: case 9751: case 9752: c.strengthLevelReq = 99; break; case 9753: case 9754: case 9755: c.defenceLevelReq = 99; break; case 9759: case 9760: case 9761: c.prayerLevelReq = 99; break; case 9762: case 9763: case 9764: c.magicLevelReq = 99; break; case 9765: case 9766: case 9767: c.runecraftingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9768: case 9769: case 9770: c.constitutionLevelReq = 99; break; case 9771: case 9772: case 9773: c.agilityLevelReq = 99; break; case 9774: case 9775: case 9776: c.herbloreLevelReq = 99; break; case 9777: case 9778: case 9779: c.thievingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9780: case 9781: case 9782: c.craftingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9783: case 9784: case 9785: c.fletchingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9786: case 9787: case 9788: c.slayerLevelreq = 99; break; case 9792: case 9793: case 9794: c.miningLevelReq = 99; break; case 9795: case 9796: case 9797: c.smithingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9798: case 9799: case 9800: c.fishingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9801: case 9802: case 9803: c.cookingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9804: case 9805: case 9806: c.firemakingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9807: case 9808: case 9809: c.woodcuttingLevelReq = 99; break; case 9810: case 9811: case 9812: c.farmingLevelReq = 99; break; case 12169: case 12170: case 12171: c.summonLevelReq = 99; break; case 9948: case 9949: case 9950: c.hunterLevelReq = 99; break;
then i got this 14 errors saying that i didnt have that skill that skill etc.
so i added

prayerLevelReq, runecraftingLevelReq, constitutionLevelReq, agilityLevelReq, herbloreLevelReq, thievingLevelReq, craftingLevelReq, slayerLevelreq, miningLevelReq, smithingLevelReq, cookingLevelReq, firemakingLevelReq, woodcuttingLevelReq, farmingLevelReq,
into player.java after the hunterLevelReq,
Then i had no errors… but i could still use the items when i was level 1 atk str etc… (Skills)

Help me. :<

Error i had were like this

src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:884: cannot find symbol symbol : variable prayerLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.prayerLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:894: cannot find symbol symbol : variable runecraftingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.runecraftingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:899: cannot find symbol symbol : variable constitutionLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.constitutionLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:904: cannot find symbol symbol : variable agilityLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.agilityLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:909: cannot find symbol symbol : variable herbloreLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.herbloreLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:914: cannot find symbol symbol : variable thievingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.thievingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:919: cannot find symbol symbol : variable craftingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.craftingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:929: cannot find symbol symbol : variable slayerLevelreq location: class server.model.players.Client c.slayerLevelreq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:934: cannot find symbol symbol : variable miningLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.miningLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:939: cannot find symbol symbol : variable smithingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.smithingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:949: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cookingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.cookingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:954: cannot find symbol symbol : variable firemakingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.firemakingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:959: cannot find symbol symbol : variable woodcuttingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.woodcuttingLevelReq = 99; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable farmingLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.farmingLevelReq = 99;
